# uptimekuma_proxy (Data Source)

Get proxy information by ID



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (Number) Proxy identifier

### Read-Only

- `host` (String) Proxy host
- `port` (Number) Proxy port
- `protocol` (String) Proxy protocol (http, https, socks5)
